field_paragraph_text.value:
A vision statement is the reason that your project exists. This is a short statement that tells others the goal of everything you do – the impact and objectives that you are trying to make a reality.

 

A vision statement tells someone what you are working towards.

 

A vision statement is the target that you are aiming for, though you may never fully reach it. Your vision statement is also a guide for all of your decisions – is this potential change going to help us reach our vision? And, it is also the measurement for your impact – is our work making any positive changes towards our vision?  Imagine your vision statement as the center of a target (the bullseye) or the house at the end of a long road. This is your ultimate goal that you will work towards.
